settings.heading: MORNING RECOVERY STARTS THE NIGHT BEFORE

settings.content: Herb that counteracts acute alcohol intoxication and reduces alcohol withdrawal symptoms, preventing adverse effects of alcohol on your liver.
settings.heading: Dihydromyricetin (DHM)

settings.content: Natural antioxidant & anti-inflammatory, providing additional protection against oxidative stress. Promotes healthy liver function, further enhancing the benefits of DHM.
settings.heading: Milk Thistle

settings.content: Root extract that helps ease nausea and soothes digestion to alleviate stomach discomfort.
settings.heading: Ginger Extract

settings.content: Powerful antioxidant that works synergistically with DHM to neutralize toxic Acetaldehyde levels. Protects the body against oxidative stress, reducing inflammation and increasing metabolism to promote overall health.
settings.heading: N-Acetyl-Cysteine

settings.content:
Sodium Chloride:
Restores the body's fluid balance and alleviates dehydration.
Magnesium Glycinate:
Crucial for muscle health, energy production, blood pressure regulation, immune systems, headache relief, and improves sleep.
Potassium Chloride:
Supports nerve and muscle function while preventing cramping.
settings.heading: Electrolytes

settings.content:
Vitamin B Complex:
Fights nausea, fatigue, and anxiety. Aids the body in producing and storing energy. Promotes nervous system and blood cell health.
Vitamin C:
Antioxidant that boosts the immune system and reduces oxidative stress.
settings.heading: Vitamins

settings.description: Take Before, During, or Shortly After Consuming Alcohol
settings.title: When?

settings.dropdown_1_content: Restores electrolytes lost from alcohol consumption, helping to balance your hydration while reducing headaches and fatigue. It also supports nervous system function, promoting relaxation and reducing the stress effects of a hangover.
settings.dropdown_2_content: Restores electrolytes preventing dehydration and muscle cramps caused by alcohol consumption. It helps maintain proper fluid balance and nerve function.
settings.dropdown_3_content: Helps restore electrolyte balance by retaining essential fluids, preventing dehydration, and reducing hangover symptoms like headaches and dizziness. It supports optimal hydration, keeping you feeling refreshed and recovered after a night out.
settings.title: Hydration

settings.dropdown_1_content: Helps strengthen your immune system and helps combat oxidative stress caused by alcohol, reducing inflammation and supporting faster recovery. It also aids in flushing out toxins, keeping you feeling refreshed instead of rundown after a night out.
settings.title: Immunity

settings.dropdown_1_content: Supports your liver by accelerating alcohol metabolism and reducing toxic byproducts like acetaldehyde, the main cause of hangovers. It is an all-natural Japanese herb that detoxifies your system strikingly fast.
settings.dropdown_2_content: Contains silymarin, a powerful antioxidant that protects liver cells, supports detoxification, and helps flush out toxins like acetaldehyde, the main culprit behind hangovers. It boosts liver function, so you recover faster and feel better in the morning.
settings.title: Liver Detox

settings.dropdown_1_content: Supports your nervous system and helps regulate mood by reducing alcohol-induced fatigue and brain fog, easing the effects of "hangxiety." It boosts energy and neurotransmitter function, helping you feel more balanced and clear-headed after a night out.
settings.dropdown_2_content: Helps combat "hangxiety" by calming the nervous system, reducing nausea, and balancing blood sugar levels, which can fluctuate after drinking. Its natural anti-inflammatory properties also support digestion and overall recovery, helping you feel more stable and at ease.
settings.title: Hangxiety

settings.description: Sign up for our newsletter and unlock exclusive deals, stay updated on groundbreaking solutions, and enjoy 15% off your first order! Don't miss out on transforming your recovery game—your mornings will thank you.
settings.heading: GET 15% OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER

settings.body_text: For the best results, take REVYVE the night of drinking. Either prior to, during, or shortly after consuming alcohol. You can also mix it in while drinking or before bed to support recovery. REVYVE works overtime while you sleep allowing you to feel 100% every morning.
settings.title: When To Use REVYVE

settings.content: Introducing REVYVE Night Out Recovery Mix. Scientifically formulated with DHM and key nutrients to support liver function, aid alcohol metabolism, and ensure you wake up ready to go. Mixed with water and taken before, during, or shortly after consuming alcohol.
settings.heading: Backed By Science
